    • Method Detail

      • generateItemStackList

        private java.util.List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> generateItemStackList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> itemNames)
        Generates a list of item stacks from MythicMobs, based on their names. Items can have title suffixes, indicated by a ; after their name. Logs to the console, if an item is unknown.
        Parameters:
        itemNames - The names of the items.
        Returns:
        The generated list of item stacks.
        See Also:
        ItemManager.getItem(String), ItemManager.getItemStack(String), WauzDebugger.log(String)
